content: Can you believe that Angela went all the way to Michael's house JUST to blow up at him and to destroy his car?? I mean, she did BUY the car, but honestly she was just way too over the top for me ðŸ¤·
Darcey and Stacey are my favorite people on the show, they deserve to be protected at all costs...and I'll fight anyone who disagrees...

Here we go again with the same old same old nonsense by the same old same old people! Honestly, how many more seasons of Natalie whining do we really need? She needs to focus on herself instead of finding a man ðŸ’¯
Snooze fest on Liz and Ed, they are truly unbelievably dull
I'm am team Jenny and Sumit forever and ever, but girl he's not going to abandon his family for you
